game.name: Solitaire Battle
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Camera Comfort, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 솔리테어를 플레이하여 적을 처치하고, 카드 기반 공격과 능력을 시너지시킨 후, 게임의 균형을 깨뜨려 이 로그라이크 덱빌딩 오토배틀러에서 Solitaire Battle 역사상 최고가 되어보세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Slay your enemies by playing solitaire, synergize your card-powered attacks and abilities, then break the game and become the best to ever Solitaire Battle in this roguelike deckbuilding autobattler!
